rocky.teatime.database.visualise

Class GridVisualiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ItemHolder>
      • rocky.teatime.database.visualise.DatabaseVisualiser
        • rocky.teatime.database.visualise.GridVisualiser

  • public class GridVisualiser
extends DatabaseVisualiser
    Handles the display of database items in a nice grid based format!
